incidents.name: Issue in Trust Hub

incident_updates.body: We have detected an issue with Trust Hub that has been resolved. Between 10:33 AM PT and 11:09 AM PT, customers may have been unable unable to perform account upgrades or sign up for products that require regulatory compliance, such as Phone Numbers. This issue has been resolved.

incidents.name: Gather Speech Recognition Returning English (en-US) Results When Language Hebrew (he-IL) Specified

incident_updates.body: The issue where Gather speech recognition results are returned in the the English language (en-US) when the Hebrew language (he-IL) has been resolved and Gather speech recognition is operating normally at this time.

Our engineering team continues to work on a change to bring both languages back to an operational state. The recommended workaround is to use the (iw-IL) language for now. We expect to have another update within 8 hours.

We have reinstated the original functionality where specifying (he-IL) language is not operational. The recommended workaround is to use the (iw-IL) language for now. Our engineering team is working on a change to bring both languages back to an operational state. We are reverting the status of this incident to investigating until our next update. We expect to have an update at 12:00 Pacific time on April 11th.

We are observing recovery from the issue where Gather speech recognition results are returned in the English language (en-US) when the Hebrew language (he-IL) is specified. If affected customers changed the specified language to iw-IL in response to this issue, they should revert the specified language back to he-IL. We expect to provide another update in 1 hours or as soon as more information is available.

We are observing recovery from the issue where Gather speech recognition results are returned in the English language (en-US) when the Hebrew language (he-IL) is specified. If affected customers changed the specified language to iw-IL in response to this issue, they should revert the specified language back to he-IL. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information is available.

We are currently investigating an issue where Gather speech recognition results are returned in the the English language (en-US) when the Hebrew language (he-IL) is specified. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Meta Template Approval Webhook Delivery Failure

incident_updates.body: A bug in Meta's system that was causing a delay in template status change events has been resolved, and template status change events are operating normally at this time.

A bug in Meta's system that was causing a delay in template status change events has been resolved.  However, customers that submitted templates while this bug was active may still see discrepancies with the status of their templates.  Twilio engineers are still working to ensure templates submitted prior to this issue being resolved are synchronized with Meta.  We expect to provide another update in 24 hours.

There is currently a bug in Meta's systems that is causing a delay in template status change event delivery. There will be a delay for the time it takes for a template approval to be reflected in Twilio's systems. Customers may see a discrepancy in the template status between Meta and Twilio during this delay. Twilio will continue to monitor the situation while Meta resolves the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
